text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Come on, Faux News just reported that lie to make up for the pathetic turn out of your Coronavirus Rally. Your speech was pathetic too. Seriously, it really was. The Repub controlled Senate didn't vote you out but we will! We're tired of  lies & being embarrassed by you! Grow up!
